title: Please be some MVPS for me
body: So I just obtained a champion shard for Volibear and I'm off by 84 blue shards if i was to disenchant Amumu, I was wondering if you guys could by chance give me the 84 blue shards or the 1 flipping RP I'm missing to buy the champion with my RP. Let me know soon if so thank you for reading this if you took time to,

replies.body:
https://media.giphy.com/media/10jRHyuxV1FsvC/giphy.gif

Make sure to check your RP total next time you log in, delivery poros are on the way!!
You are the real MVP of the league community, i appreciate it
I present the one and only VOLI PORO!! [](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B2xYQhen9ysJV1RLQzRsTkdVS1kwTHNnOHNnSDhSbDZRbVRz)
